website_summaries.verdict: Not only is the Adidas Samba famous for its classic aesthetics, but it is also well-liked for its affordability, durability, and versatility. As such, Adidas proudly includes the Samba into the brand’s Originals collection.Despite some minor flaws, its popularity remains unchanged as the majority choose to tolerate these. Sold at a pocket-friendly price, many remain pleased with its good looks, performance and reliable comfort.
pros: The Adidas Samba flaunts a vintage look that is simple and clean yet appealing to most Adidas fanatics
The majority of shoppers have considered this shoe as affordable
The Adidas Samba shoes have received heaps of praises for its comfortable in-shoe feel
More than a handful have revealed that the shoe held up even after using it daily for several years
Those who’ve worn the sneaker for cycling, soccer, running, driving, as well as long walks and trail hikes are pleased with its satisfactory performance
The shoe is lightweight and solidly-built, based on a good number of reviews
Some have worn the Adidas Samba sneakers during rainy days and were happy that the interior of the shoes remained dry
The sneaker looked terrific in person than online, a few have noticed
It broke in quickly, a large number of buyers have remarked
Several wore this shoe with orthotics
cons: A significant number have complained about the shoe’s sole or leather upper squeaking
A couple of users are dismayed that the insoles on this model wear out after a month or so of usage
The tongue on this shoe slipped and twisted, a few users have observed
Its sole is hard and is not as grippy as expected, not many have advised, with one or two wearers saying that it slips on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: bit squeaky
customer_reviews.text: put them on found them a bit squeaky went online found there is abit off a fault with the tongue,got the finest sand paper and gently rubbed the tongue a lot quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Terry.higgins

customer_reviews.title: First class
customer_reviews.text: A nice pair of trainers at a good price. The squeeking of the tongue is cured by simply rubbing a bit of baby oil or coconut oil on it, stops it straight away. These are iconic shoes and are perfect for all casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Fezmeister

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fast delivery. My husband loves the Adidas Samba range and needed a new pair for work (after the dog got to his last pair 🤦🏻‍♀️) these arrived really quickly and are a great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Sqeuaky
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Good for indoor football, especially for those with wide feet. They squeak though which is pretty annoying and is a design floor. This is caused by the lip of the shoe rubbing on the leather sides.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dervin

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and a great trainer. Good price too at under Fifty quid
customer_reviews.text: A quality classic from Adidas. I usually go one size up with Adidas as they come up as little small. Applied the same thinking to these and they are slightly too big! My fault, but nothing too drastic. Quick delivery and a great trainer. Good price too at under Fifty quid.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Munick

customer_reviews.title: Look good & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Look good & comfortable but I needed to do the talc trick as they squeaked like hell to start with.
customer_reviews.author: trevsie1967

customer_reviews.title: Decent trainers
customer_reviews.text: Squeaks because new but this will go once trodden in. Great trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Sueey

customer_reviews.title: Not the classic samba
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as classic sambas. Also the size is a little narrow compared with my previous ones and they squeak when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Grest shoe, size rsther small.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking well made trainer. I am a UK shoe size 8, I ordered a 9. Just a bit too small. Amazon returns excellent though.
customer_reviews.author: WatfordDave

customer_reviews.title: get larger size
customer_reviews.text: would advise anyone ordering to ask for size larger as very tight fitting
customer_reviews.author: Frank McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: I am an 8 but they are a slim fit.unusual for adidas.hope they aren't copies
customer_reviews.author: trevor kelso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for hubby, he loves them. Fit well. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Haggis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very squeaky makes a noise every time I move my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duffy

customer_reviews.title: 🍾🍾
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Arrived on schedule..Packed with original box & tag. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to wear the leather in, you will 100% get blisters first couple of wears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size was at least two sizes smaller
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the size to be at least 2 sizes smaller than expected. The size chart is supposed to be more accurate and should be posted as per an item not a general one like the one available. Every shoes has it's own frame, design and hence size
customer_reviews.author: mdirani

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers look really smart,and fit great,so pleased I ordered them,cheers.👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these just delivered and had them on today - good comments from a lot of people
customer_reviews.text: Got these just delivered and had them on today - good comments from a lot of people. Look good comfortable,on trend for me and a lot others. 👍👍👍👌
customer_reviews.author: debra macgregor

product_meta.title: adidas Unisex Adult Samba Low Top
product_meta.description: The adidas Originals Samba was originally made to perform on frozen pitches. This version of these classic football shoes is styled in leather with authentic colours from the archive.
